docs.title: LCPDFR-IV
docs.text:
This is a GTA IV modding community started off for LCPDFR role playing bringing back to life multiplayer, mods, and enforcing the law on those who breaks them within Liberty City!

Join us on Discord to participate!

docs.title: LCPDFR v0.6 Mods
docs.text:
LCPDFR-IV is currently using LCPDFR 1.1 Non Legacy.

Warning

You do not need to download each mod individually. The modpack with everything can be found on Discord

Base Mods
  • Rush Hour (removed due to possible crashes)
  • Center Steering Patch
  • Indicators
    • Uses LEFT & RIGHT arrows. scripts/indicator.ini
  • ELS
  • The Wasteland Callouts
  • AiSirens
  • vdH Towing Service
  • Backup Callout
  • Door Ajar Chime
  • WoutersCallouts
  • Policing Script (Testing)
  • Simple Fuel System (Drive to a gas station and press 5 on Number-Pad)
  • Ticket Time (Testing. Press Z after getting out car during traffic stop)
Graphical (Optional)
  • LCPD Pack
  • Road Textures
  • iCEnhancer 3.0 Natural
QoL
  • Realistic Weapon Sounds
  • ZMenuIV (Keybind Changed Too F1. Navigate with Keypad numbers)
  • OvertakingFix
  • Rumbler Siren
  • Project Thunder Using RDR2 lightning/weather sounds
